== Open-Expo Winterthur 2009 ==

=== Date and time ===

The booth will be on Wednesday and Thursday, 23/24 September at the Eulachhalle in Winterthur.

=== Booth layout ===

1 table, 4 chairs

There will not be enough space for more than two laptops. I will be there either the evening before or early Wednesday morning to mount the booth.-- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:myriam]]</nowiki> 
=== Booth material ===

I have CDs for both Ubuntu 9.04 and Kubuntu 9.04. I will also order a Conference Pack A as described here: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuAtConferences]]</nowiki>

* ToDos:
** have a poster prepared in SVG and PDF, deadline to send is 15.9.2009
